newsitem.title: USA: Regis acquires two salons in Colorado.
newsitem.headline: Regis acquires two salons in Colorado.

text.p: Regis Corp said Thursday it acquired two beauty salons in Longmont and Loveland, Colo., which generate about $500,000 in annual sales.
The salons were formerly owned and operated by a Supercuts franchisee and will continue to operate within Regis's Supercuts division. Terms of the transactions were not disclosed.

Including these transactions, Regis has completed 59 acquisitions in the past 41 months, adding 1,686 salons generating annualized revenue of $239 million and system-wide sales of $481 million. Regis operates and franchises 3,253 salons.
